name: Solar Grid
description:
Begin gameplay as a single solar module, starting with nothing to connect with or defend yourself with. From this helpless starting position, use the energy you harvest to branch outward, fortify your defenses, and survive as long as you can.

When you run out of solar modules, the game is over.

Controls:

  • Q: Switch to building solar modules
  • W: Switch to building combat modules
  • E: Switch to connecting modules
  • Left click: Selects a module, or unselects if you click on empty space
  • Right click: Builds a new module or link based on your current choice of Q/W/E
  • Spacebar: Shoot if you have a combat module selected.
